text: Pyrausta pavidalis is a moth in the family Crambidae. It was described by Zerny in 1935. It is found in Turkey and Ukraine. ==Subspecies== *Pyrausta pavidalis pavidalis *Pyrausta pavidalis krimensis (Martin & Budashkin, 1992) (Ukraine: Crimea) ==References== Category:Moths described in 1935 pavidalis Category:Moths of Europe Category:Moths of Turkey
title: Pyrausta pavidalis
